entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING , Chéticamp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chéticamp 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
